name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edmund J. JURGELWICZ, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
CASTILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edmund J. JURGELWICZ, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
CASTILLE, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Jeffrey M. Kolansky, Philadelphia, for E. Jurgelwicz.
Catherine Marshall, Ronald Eisenberg, Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
649 A.2d 433
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edmund J. JURGELWICZ, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 17, 1994.
Decided Nov. 4, 1994.
Jeffrey M. Kolansky, Philadelphia, for E. Jurgelwicz.
Catherine Marshall, Ronald Eisenberg, Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for Com.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
